CFS Stored Command (SC) User's Guide

CFS Stored Command Configuration Parameters

CFS Stored Command Commands

CFS Stored Command Telemetry

CFS Stored Command Table Definitions

The following are configuration parameters used to configure the CFS Stored Command Application either for each platform or for a mission as a whole.

Next: CFS Stored Command Constraints
Prev: CFS Stored Command Table Definitions

Global SC_APPEND_BUFF_SIZE

Max buffer size for an Append ATS in uint16s

Global SC_APPEND_FILE_NAME

Append ATS Table Filename

Global SC_APPEND_TABLE_NAME

Append ATS Table Object Names

Global SC_APPENDINFO_TABLE_NAME

Name of the Append ATS Infomation Table

Global SC_ATS_BUFF_SIZE

Max buffer size for an ATS in uint16s

Global SC_ATS_CMD_STAT_TABLE_NAME

Name Prefix of ATS Cmd Status Table

Global SC_ATS_CTRL_TABLE_NAME

Name of the ATP Control block table

Global SC_ATS_FILE_NAME

ATS Table Filenames

Global SC_ATS_TABLE_NAME

ATS Table Object Names

Global SC_ATSINFO_TABLE_NAME

Name of the ATS Infomation Table

Global SC_CONT_ON_FAILURE_START

Defnies default state of Continue-Ats-On-Checksum-Failure Flag

Global SC_ENABLE_GROUP_COMMANDS

Define inclusion state for RTS group commands

Global SC_LAST_RTS_WITH_EVENTS

The last RTS that will be sent with an SC_RTS_START_INF_EID event message

Global SC_MAX_ATS_CMDS

Max number of commands in each ATS

Global SC_MAX_CMDS_PER_SEC

Max number of commands per second

Global SC_MISSION_REV

Mission specific version number for SC application

Global SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS

Number of RTS's

Global SC_PACKET_MAX_SIZE

Maximum Packet Size

Global SC_PACKET_MIN_SIZE

Minimum Packet Size

Global SC_PIPE_DEPTH

Command Pipe Depth

Global SC_RTP_CTRL_TABLE_NAME

Name of the RTP Control block table

Global SC_RTS_BUFF_SIZE

Max buffer size for an RTS in uint16s

Global SC_RTS_FILE_NAME

RTS Table Filenames

Global SC_RTS_TABLE_NAME

RTS Table Object Names

Global SC_RTSINFO_TABLE_NAME

Name of the RTS Infomation Table

Global SC_TIME_TO_USE

Defines the TIME SC should use for its commands
